question.title: Will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran support a proxy group that conducts an attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that a proxy group supported by Iran has conducted an attack within Israel's borders.

P_given_Q.title: If Iran supports a proxy group that conducts an attack within Israel before May 1, 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that a proxy group supported by Iran has conducted an attack within Israel's borders (P) AND credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals (Q).

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Iran does not support a proxy group conducting an attack within Israel, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that a proxy group supported by Iran has conducted an attack within Israel's borders. If this condition holds, then this question resolves **Yes** if credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran conduct a military operation against Israel that results in casualties before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that a military operation attributed to Iran against Israel has resulted in casualties, regardless of the number of casualties.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran conducts a military operation against Israel that results in casualties, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that a military operation attributed to Iran against Israel has resulted in casualties, regardless of the number of casualties. Additionally, this question resolves Yes if credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran does not conduct a military operation against Israel that results in casualties before May 1, 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that a military operation attributed to Iran against Israel has resulted in casualties. Additionally, this question resolves Yes if credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran be implicated in a deadly attack outside of Israel before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran has occurred outside of Israel's borders and has led to the death of at least five individuals.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran is implicated in a deadly attack outside of Israel, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel?
P_given_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran has occurred outside of Israel's borders and has led to the death of at least five individuals. Additionally, this question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. The resolution criteria for both components must be met.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Iran is not implicated in a deadly attack outside of Israel before May 1, 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Iran has occurred outside of Israel's borders and has led to the death of at least five individuals. Additionally, this question resolves Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

question.title: Is it expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

Q.title: Will Iran support a militant group that conducts an attack inside Israel before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing support to a militant group that leads to an attack within Israel's borders.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran's support for a militant group, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: Suppose the following is true: There are credible reports of Iran providing support to a militant group that leads to an attack within Israel's borders before May 1, 2024. Then is it expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024? This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Iran does not support a militant group that conducts an attack inside Israel before May 1, 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by that date?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. However, if Iran does not support a militant group that conducts an attack inside Israel before May 1, 2024, it is less likely that such an attack would occur. Therefore, we are interested in whether the outcome Q holds true under the condition P. Resolution criteria: P resolves as Yes if there are no credible reports of Iran providing support to a militant group that leads to an attack within Israel's borders, and Q resolves as Yes if there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

Q.title: Will Iran support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing direct military support to a group conducting operations against Israel, resulting in significant military engagement.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran's support for a significant military operation against Israel, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body:
This conditional question considers the following: Will Iran support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024? This question will resolve as Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing direct military support to a group conducting operations against Israel, resulting in significant military engagement. 

If this condition is true, it will then be evaluated whether it is expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024. This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran will not support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will resolve as Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. 

Condition: This question will resolve as Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are no credible reports of Iran providing direct military support to a group conducting operations against Israel, resulting in significant military engagement.

Q.title: Will Iran launch a missile strike against Israeli territory before June 2024?
Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before June 1, 2024, there are credible reports of a missile strike linked to Iran that targets Israeli territory and results in significant damage or casualties.

P_given_Q.title: Given that Iran launches a missile strike against Israeli territory before June 2024, is it expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before June 1, 2024, there are credible reports of a missile strike linked to Iran that targets Israeli territory and results in significant damage or casualties. Additionally, it will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran does not launch a missile strike against Israeli territory before June 2024, will it be expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. The condition is that there are no credible reports of a missile strike linked to Iran that targets Israeli territory and results in significant damage or casualties before June 1, 2024.
